original_text: So, my friends, try very much to live in a way that pleases God. God has chosen you to be his own people. Show that you really do belong to him! If you do these things, you will never turn away from God.
korean_text: 그러므로 형제들아 더욱 힘써 너희 부르심과 택하심을 굳게 하라 너희가 이것을 행한즉 언제든지 실족하지 아니하리라

sentences.original_text: So, my friends, try very much
to live in a way that pleases God
Show that you really do belong to him
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 정말로 그에게 속한다는 것을 보여라

sentences.original_text: you will never turn away from God
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 결코 하나님에게서 떠나지 않을 것이다
